body.name: USB Flash Drive 4GB 10 Pack USB 2.0 Thumb Drive Jump Drive Bulk Memory Sticks Zip Drives Swivel Keychain Design 10 Pieces Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 4 mins
features: 10 PACK USB STICKS: 10 pieces USB flash drives are well packed in a cardboard box. Suitable for storing and sharing files, perfect for classes, business meetings, promotions, anniversary events, etc.

SWIVEL DESIGN: The 360° rotating metal clip protects the USB interface from damage when not in use; Unlike plastic ones, this metal-capped usb drive is more elegant and durable, and will not crack even after using for a long time.
PORTABILITY: The small ring is designed for key chains or lanyards. You can take your digital world anywhere, without worrying about losing the pen drive.

PLUG AND PLAY: No need to install any software, the zip drive is easy to be recognized by computer, laptop, notebook, PC, car audio, speaker, smart TV, etc. Compatible with Windows 7/8/10/Vista/2000/XP/ME/NT Linux and Mac OS, support USB 2.0 and 1.1.
AFTER-SALES SERVICE: 12 month Warranty. Please contact us first for any problems with our jump drives. We will solve it as soon as possible.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 13,390 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Key Features of MECHEER USB Thumb Drives: 360° Swiveling Cap 360° rotation of the metal cap well protects the USB connector. With cappless design, get rid of the trouble of missing the cap. Keyring Design The small loop at the end of the cap for a keychain or lanyard helps to keep the USB memory stick from losing. Mini and compact design, you can put the flashdrive in pocket or anywhere. LED Indicator A red light flashes when the photo stick is working. (Due to the dark plastic shell of the flash drive, the light inside is blocked and only can be seen when in darkness.) For Various Data Support different files, including video, music, picture, documents, design files, etc. Well store and organize your different files in MECHEER USB stick!

SPECIFICATIONS: Capacity: 4GB Color: Black Quantity: 10 Pack Material: ABS Plastic and Metal Chip: Grade A Default Memory Format: FAT32 (can be formatted to exFAT, NTFS, etc) Interface: USB 2.0 compatible (backwards compatible to USB 1.1) Operation System: Windows 7/8/10/ ME/ Vista / XP/ 2000 / NT Linux and Mac OS, etc.

NOTE: 1. The actual available capacity of the memory stick is a little smaller than we listed, this is because different calculations between computer and manufacturer: Computer: 1MB=1024KB, 1GB=1024MB Manufacturer: 1MB=1000KB, 1GB=1000MB 2.Do not pull out the USB flash drive while reading or saving data. The interruption may damage the data or damage the USB flash drive. 3.Every piece is tested and double checked before shipped out. We will offer professional service if there are any questions or concerns regarding our USB sticks.

64GB 5PACK 32GB 5PACK Digital Storage Capacity 64GB 32GB Color 5 Pack Mixed Color 5 Pack Mixed Color Hardware Interface USB 2.0 USB 2.0 Default Format exFAT FAT32 Approximate Actual Capacity 59.6GB 29.8GB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2.0 USB so not fast, but large capacity and cheap and working fine for me!
reviews.reviewText: Bought a set of these in 64GB size. Says right up top they are USB 2.0 so don't expect 3.1 speed. Write speed is generally between 4 and 8 MB/s which takes a bit. But I am not going to downrate a product that's upfront with this at all. All came pre-formatted with exFAT. I changed some to NTFS but probably wasn't needed. I did run a full USB test on one because there are definitely bad actors out there that sell scam USB drives (usually USB) and for some reason Amazon doesn't police them like they should. But these are legit and as advertised. Size after formatting for 64GB is about 58.5GB in Win10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice addition to the computing accessories we have. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great way to store data
reviews.reviewText: Since most computers don't have a CD slot anymore you need a thumb drive to share large files and store data. These are inexpensive and reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Generally good buy
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these for a good while now. I generally love them and the amount of storage that they have. The only problem is that the yellow one seems to always have a problem. I have had to reformat it twice and it has failed to retain documents that I have put on it. I have used the Microsoft repair tool and it says that it is repaired, but twice now I've had to reload it. Because I can't trust it, I also have to keep that same information on another device. I don't know what happened to this one in particular or if its just a factory defect that will never be resolved. The others are working great and I love them. I love that they are color-coded to help me have a system of storage. I would recommend them in spite of my failed yellow one because I do think it is just a fluke that others may not experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 32 GB Colorful USB Thumb drives
reviews.reviewText: In contrast, to at least one of the reviews I read, I received these in the mail yesterday morning. It took only a few days to arrive by the delivery truck. I used two of the five so far and they both work as they are supposed to. I'm very happy with the speed of delivery, the speed of the storage and I like having different colors so I can identify what I have stored on them. On my blue one, I store about thirty golf instruction videos. I'm transferring old VCRs using the appropriate software and a converting VCR machine that transports the old VCR onto my hard drive and then I'm putting them on my blue USB thumb drive. On my yellow one, I am storing photos from an old computer on to the yellow thumb drive. These thumb drives are wonderful for my needs. I'm also storing the golf videos on to DVD-R disks. This is a small company that would be happy to receive your orders at a very fair price. Try them, I think you'll be satisfied with your purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: General use flash drives. USB 2.0. Reasonably priced. Color coded. Let the kids choose which one they wanted. I got blue. Some for spare. Haven’t tried the key ring attachment, but it seems nice to have. No print on these drives so you better remember their capacity or etch it on yourself. I just bought them and I already forget their capacity lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended.
reviews.reviewText: Overall I am happy with these. I bought them to copy what was on my computer when we thought we might have to evacuate the home during last year's fire season. I was able to copy everything on just one of the USB drives. I copied pictures (separately) on the other drives to give to several family members. Glad I bought them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flash stip memory
reviews.reviewText: El precio y la rapides con la que llego la orden.

reviews.reviewTitle: USB Stick Flash Drive 64GB 5 Pack USB 2.0 Bulk Memory Sticks - Yellow/Red/Blue/Green/Black (5 PCS)
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I purchased this product. An easy-to-use product that serves my needs well. It is economical and the product is always delivered quickly and in an efficient manner. This is just a "layman's" view & opinion. Only time will tell its' longevity. Thank you, Vendor & Amazon.
Bought this to go with digital photo frame for my mom. Easy to use, set up no problem. Still have lots of storage left. Can't beat the price.
Love the package deal, very useful for organizing all of our photos. Made labels for each one and has lots of space for everything. Happy with the product!
Good transfer speed, works great for reading videos on tv.
